o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_PivotAggregatedAttributeSelector
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:GetMethodScript:
Function %Get%(obj) 'Initialize the return value to an empty string. %Get% = ""
' Get the source object to select the attribute from. Dim objSourceObject : Set objSourceObject = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_PivotAggregatedAttribute_SourceObject") Dim objAggregatedAttribute: Set objAggregatedAttribute = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_PivotAggregatedAttribute")
' If the source feature is not empty, the source is a real attribute. If Not(objAggregatedAttribute Is Nothing) Then ' If the source object is also known, the mapping is correct and we present the source attribute. If Not(objSourceObject Is Nothing) Then %Get% = objSourceObject.DisplayName & "." & objAggregatedAttribute.DisplayName End If End If
End Function
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:SetMethodScript: Sub %Set%(obj, value) MsgBox "Manual input is not allowed." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf _ & "Please use the [...] button to select an attribute." _ , vbExclamation _ , "Please select an attribute" End Sub
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Label: Pivot Aggregated Attribute (MDDE)
